data.actual_result: the search board collapses and the search bar stays expanded and a offsetted search board the next search
data.expected_result: nothing since im only right clicking something that's only left click-able
data.short_description: right clicking "clear search history" collapses search board and not search bar, also offested search board next search
data.steps_to_repro: - right click `clear search history` (you need to do a search first for the option to show) - notice that the search bar is still expanded - click on the search bar again and notice how the search board is a bit to the right
